name: Down Town City Bus Driver: Transport Simulation 3D
name_original: Down Town City Bus Driver: Transport Simulation 3D
description:
Enjoy the best Bus Driver Job in Metro Bus Service! Steer the big vehicle Metro Bus and start your city drive for transporting passengers in New big cities of the world, with fantastic city environment in day and night modes. Metro city Bus Public Transport Driving Simulation is a driving and pick & drop game for transporting passengers to their destinations. Drive awesome 3D Metro Bus and enjoy realistic city traffic and Metro tracks. To be precise on time, head to the terminal with speeding race. Extreme driving and parking bus game will refresh your driving skills and dream of driving a real on-tour metro bus. Like parking games you have to stop city metro bus to pick passengers and to drop them on time.

Driving a real big bus which has the duty to take passengers and drop them on their specified stations is a real challenging job that requires true attention to play Metro city Bus Public Transport Driving Simulation and your points will let you get to the next thrilling levels of this game. Task is challenging so be on time. Being a metro bus driver your duty is to arrive on time. Time to ride a metro bus in city traffic at extreme speed. Show your extreme driving skills and simulate your drive with 3D metro bus. When you are on the city-road with your metro retro bus there are signals for the passenger picking, they are either on the bus station or randomly on road sides, keep your eyes towards them so that no passenger is left behind. It a hurry to rush game, reaching destination in time, with least collision rate and ensuring safety to the people in your bus will let you upgrade the game in less amount of time.

This latest game of all times is waiting for its driver to get the metro bus to its station in time and become the best on-duty driver. It is a dream of many people to ride a big bus, or a big heavy vehicle that gives plenty of challenging tasks, to test your skills and driving a bus experience. So here is the time for your to get into one of such experiences for free, by installing Metro city Bus Public Transport Driving Simulation in your mobile and enjoy endless extreme game-play with ultimate goals to complete and accomplish the title of best rider, road king or a metro-bus champ!

Metro city Bus Public Transport Driving Simulation Features:
• Cool jumbo city metro buses
• Realistic metro tracks and stations
• Three touch steering and button control options with the built-in accelero meter
• Different camera angles that give you more control
• Amazing 3D graphics
• Extreme precision driving and sound simulations
• Challenging and outstanding 3D outdoor environment with stunning graphics
• Optimized game performance.
• Realistic vehicle physics, high quality graphics and unlimited missions.
• Great Game Play and controls.
• Refreshing background music & sound effects.
• Realistic bus features.
• Easy and exciting game play.
• Huge 3D virtual city to explore.
